thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Interface Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $0.25

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Interface Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $0.25
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Interface Inc:
* Q1 SALES $241 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $234.6 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.23 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* INTERFACE - QTRLY ORGANIC ORDERS, WHICH EXCLUDES IMPACT OF FOREIGN CURRENCY FLUCTUATIONS AND EXITING FLOR SPECIALTY RETAIL, WERE UP 12% YEAR OVER YEAR
* REAFFIRMS IT IS TARGETING TO ACHIEVE 3 - 5% ORGANIC SALES GROWTH, GROSS PROFIT MARGIN OF 39 - 39.5% IN FY 2018
* INTERFACE - CONTINUES TO EXPECT ITS STRONGEST OPERATING INCOME GROWTH IN Q2 AND Q3 OF 2018, WITH SOFTER GROWTH IN Q1 AND Q4 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
